3: The ultimate God, Almighty.
You are my faith, I follow your will and walk the path you pave.
Please will you listen to your pious believer's prayers...
And save this church, save all your children here awaiting your help...
Wh-what's this?!
Miyi's bag! Is that... blood?!
Miyi!!
Mama! I'm scared...
Don't worry, Mama's here!
Those goddamned mechanic monsters!
Watch it... You're in a church...
Ha! So?
Faith means nothing in this era!
Open your eyes! Look where we are!
We're stuck in here! Yet anybody is going to save us?
If there wasn't this church... we were all dead!
With the blizzard outside, and the mad mechanical monsters everywhere...
How can we get out of here!
...I know I am a sinner who needs your forgiveness.
But I, Bianca, will be willing to give my life for this.
Please, save us all...
